name: Ui Max - Create a complete website faster
description:
Find +100 Free Figma + HTML Landing Page Templates


Ui Max is a powerful Figma UI Kit that helps you design a complete and elegant website faster without requiring much effort and time.


This UI kit will be perfect for your startup business ideas. You will be able to easily create a complete website for local businesses, corporate companies, mobile Applications, Saas products, creative solutions, and many other business areas.


Features:


1 - Simplifying the Ui Kit:


One of the main challenges of UI kits is that they are large files containing numerous UI components, elements, and webpages. Sometimes it's hard to find a particular component and it may get frustrating at times. It becomes a time-consuming exercise and one could easily lose focus from the main project at hand itself. We have included a navigation menu inside the main file in order to assist with finding any components, UI elements, or a web page faster.


2 - Well Organized File Structure:


Since there are a wide range of Ui Elements spread across 15 categories such as header, call to action, features, pricing.. etc, itâ€™s important to keep them all aligned. We have arranged each Element category in order of their priorities and they all reside inside a particular file page, so the users can easily pick the element of their choice.


3 - Web Page Templates:


There are many ready to use web page design templates which include: Home pages, Product pages, Legal pages, Blog pages, FAQ pages, Listing pages, and User account pages and lots more.


4 - Mobile First :


Every UI element or web page is first built to adapt to a mobile screen first and then a desktop version is also created. All the elements can easily be resized to fit a wide range of screen sizes.

Highlights


- Best for App, SaaS Product, Software and Digital Products

- Responsive Elements

- High-Resolution Design
